content: Could anyone please take a look at PR #3717? It has been a few days since I applied the requested changes.
I think we are waiting for Johan's vacations to end here. But maybe @Kevin Buzzard could have a look. Or @Chris Hughes could merge it anyway.

This PR is mostly adding instances for a typeclass which I have never used but which I hope will be useful for me in commutative algebra. Not having a clue about the details of typeclass inference I can't comment on whether they are good or bad instances (but if the linter isn't complaining then great).
